subject: The Ire
text:
Encrypting the cause―
of death. Why do you 
truss up the statement? 

Tell me, whom you were 
punishing, accepting
the legitimacy of lies? 
Anything would happen 
to the author, 
who was writing a diary 
on the fallen saint.

The palace fumes. There 
was an extraordinary delay 
in execution of 
fire spoons.
